title: Worlds Viewing Party: SUPPORT THE WOLF PACK (SYDNEY) 18+

embed.description: Welcome Summoners, We are hosting a viewing party to support our very first OCE team going to worlds, THE DIREWOLVES!! What better way to watch the...

body:
Welcome Summoners,

We are hosting a viewing party to support our very first OCE team going to worlds, THE DIREWOLVES!!
What better way to watch the kick off of Worlds than with other esports fans! Enjoy the atmosphere and make some noise for the Dire Wolves with fellow Oce fans.

23/09/2017 - ~~6:30pm AEST DW vs Cloud 9
23/09/2017 - ~~8:30pm AEST DW vs Team One Esports
24/09/2017 - ~~5:00pm AEST DW vs Cloud 9
24/09/2017 - ~~7:00pm AEST DW vs Team One Esports

Full schedule - http://www.lolesports.com/en_AU/worlds/world_championship_2017/schedule/play_in_groups/Day%201

We will have some prizes to give away if summoners who rock up in any OCE team paraphernalia, homemade signs or anything creative you can come with to show DW our support!


Palace Hotel, Sydney

Must be over 18

Saturday: 3pm to late

Sunday: 3pm to late
